# covertzbr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of covertzbr is to model the total of confirmed deaths by COVID-19
in Brazil using a Gompertz Growth Curve

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("davidmaciel/covertzbr")
```
